beskrivelse: Celebrate the best day of your life, with a cake inspired by the blue city in the north, Chefchaouen.
Our french inspired vanilla wedding cake, is a bestseller and a classic speciality, presented to you by our moroccan Conditor and Artist Hassan Hijab.
The grandest and finest wedding cake of the house, designed by Najima Hassan. With both chocolate, vanilla and strawberry layers we present you with The Royal Wedding Cake.
Enjoy your big day amongst friends and family with our notorious pillowcake.
With patterns and style inspired by european bakery we give you a beautiful cake with a twist of North Africa.
A traditional and oriental saltcaramel cake for your celebration.
A collection of delicious and pretty chocolate cupcakes, topped with buttercream of your choosing in beautiful design.
Sweet and simple cookies for your houseparty.
Our new macarons collection combined with chocolate or vanilla mousse for your celebration or your get together.
Enjoy our house speciality topped with cinnamon, made with love (served with fresh tea).
Pancakes made from a moroccan kitchen topped with berries of your choosing (served with fresh tea).
A traditional and simple serving for your sweet tooth (served with fresh tea).
A world known delicatesse from the moroccan kitchen. Fresh dates combined with nuts of your choosing and topped with honey or syrup of your choosing.
Famously known for it's presence at any moroccan wedding, we give you freshly made Kaab El Ghazal (served with fresh tea).
Enjoy moroccan made pancakes served with three kinds of berries, honey and syrup.
Get comfortable in our house with your family and friends and share our collection of party delicasies (served with fresh tea).
Fresh cut oranges topped with cinnamon for a light snack or dessert.
Known in every corner of Morocco, we give you our famous honey cakes, topped with pistachios, when you want it extra sweet.
With a combination of mint and green tea we present you with our traditional Moroccan Tea.
Served to weddings and get togethers, try our luxurious and rich avocado smoothie combined with vanilla and pistachio.
A virgin refreshment with an extra hint of Africa.
